verses.verse: God <S%H430><s%> be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto us <S%H1288><s%>, and bless us <S%H6440><s%>; and cause his face to shine <S%H215><s%> upon us <S%H5542><s%>; Selah.
That your way <S%H1870><s%> may be known <S%H3045><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>, your except health <S%H3444><s%> among all nations <S%H1471><s%>.
Let the people <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> you <S%H430><s%>, O God; let all the people <S%H5971><s%> praise you <S%H3034><s%>.

O let the nations <S%H3816><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%> and sing for joy <S%H7442><s%>: for you shall judge <S%H8199><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> righteously <S%H4334><s%>, and govern <S%H5148><s%> the nations <S%H3816><s%> upon earth <S%H776><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
Let the people <S%H5971><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> you <S%H430><s%>, O God; let all the people <S%H5971><s%> praise you <S%H3034><s%>.
Then shall the earth <S%H776><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> her increase <S%H2981><s%>; and God <S%H430><s%>, even our own God <S%H430><s%>, shall bless us <S%H1288><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> us <S%H657><s%>; and all the ends of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall fear him <S%H3372><s%>.
